Text: Have you seen my dog? I`ve lost him.
Ask1: I can help you find it>quest Pedritos Wolf>0,1

Text: Thanks! I don`t know what happened to my dog.     I gave him my best meal: Salad, tomato, beans and even soya burger, and he didn`t want to eat.      I think it could be the corona curse that he lost  appetite.
Oh no? I will search him then.
Go, find my dog and tell him to come back to home!
Go, find my dog and tell him to come back to home!
Well, my dog has returned, thanks to you, but he  still doesn`t eat. I think it`s the corona diseasePoor doggy.
Thank you! I`ll prepare him my best vegetable soupat once!. Please take it, it`s for you!
